refnamediv.refpurpose: Compile source files to binary objects

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Compile source files to binary objects.

Compilation flags default differently per compiler name specified by CC. The currently recognised compilers are gcc and clang. CFLAGS defaults to per-compiler settings for ISO C90. Individual CFLAGS specific to a particular source file may be specified by CFLAGSname.c for each source file.

listitem.para: Add flags to CFLAGS to enable debugging symbols in compiled objects. This also sets optimisation flags accordingly.

refsection.title: Input
refsection.synopsis:
BUILD := dir
CC ?= cc
INCDIR += dir
SRC += name.c ...
CFLAGS += ... CFLAGSname.c += ...
${BUILD}/name.c:
